notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved to another location.

items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Indicates the location within the site through a sequence of links.

items.title: Card
items.description: Flexible container with header, content, and footer.

items.title: Callout
items.description: Callout component to show additional content.

items.title: Collapsible
items.description: Hide or show sections of content dynamically.

items.title: Dialog
items.description: Modal windows for user notifications and interactions.

items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Menu that expands to reveal additional options.

items.title: Sheet
items.description: Sheet component to show additional content.

items.title: Tabs
items.description: Switch between different content panels easily.

items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays contextual information associated with an element when it receives keyboard focus or when the user hovers over it with the mouse.
